mapper.select: SELECT team_name, team_num from team t where team_name like CONCAT('%','MD','%') and t.act = 0 ORDER BY FIELD(team_name, 'MD본부') desc

SELECT e.emp_name, e.emp_num, e.email , e.phone e, t.team_name, t.team_num ,d.dep_name , p.pos_name , r.rank_name from employee e join team t ON e.team_num = t.team_num join departure d on t.dep_num = d.dep_num join `position` p on e.pos_num = p.pos_num join `rank` r on e.rank_num = r.rank_num where t.team_num = #{team_num} and e.state_num != 5 ORDER by r.rank_level
